languages.text: {n}В глазах Мастера дисциплины читается ужас.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, молю, это моя ошибка! Если вы исправите ее за меня, это будет позором".
{n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Мастера дисциплины читается ужас.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, молю, это моя ошибка! Если вы исправите ее за меня, это будет позором".

traits.locale_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."
{n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."
{n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be dishonoured."
{n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be dishonoured."
{n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."
{n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."

languages.text: {n}Ves el terror en los ojos de Sauerback.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, se lo imploro! El error es mío. Si permito que lo rectifique por mí, será una deshonra».
languages.original_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves el terror en los ojos de Sauerback.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, se lo imploro! El error es mío. Si permito que lo rectifique por mí, será una deshonra».

languages.text: {n}あなたはザウアーバックの目に恐怖の色を見る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、懇願いたします！これは私の過ちです。あなたに正されてしまっては、汚名を受けることになってしまいます」
languages.original_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはザウアーバックの目に恐怖の色を見る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、懇願いたします！これは私の過ちです。あなたに正されてしまっては、汚名を受けることになってしまいます」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克眼中的恐惧之意一目了然。{/n}“舰长大人，我恳求您！这一切都是我的错！如果要您替我改正这个错误，那我就太可耻了。”
languages.original_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克眼中的恐惧之意一目了然。{/n}“舰长大人，我恳求您！这一切都是我的错！如果要您替我改正这个错误，那我就太可耻了。”

languages.text: {n}Du registrierst Angst in Sauerbacks Blick.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich bitte Euch! Es war mein Fehler. Wenn Ihr ihn für mich korrigiert, bin ich entehrt."
languages.original_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du registrierst Angst in Sauerbacks Blick.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich bitte Euch! Es war mein Fehler. Wenn Ihr ihn für mich korrigiert, bin ich entehrt."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous en conjure ! {n}s'exclame Jocasta, les yeux emplis d'horreur.{/n} Cette erreur est mienne. Si vous la rectifiez pour moi, ce serait un immense déshonneur. »
languages.original_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous en conjure ! {n}s'exclame Jocasta, les yeux emplis d'horreur.{/n} Cette erreur est mienne. Si vous la rectifiez pour moi, ce serait un immense déshonneur. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in gözlerindeki korkuyu görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, istirham ediyorum! Hata benimdi. Eğer benim yerime bu işi siz düzeltirseniz onurum zarar görür."
languages.original_text: {n}You see a look of horror in Sauerback's eyes.{/n} "Lord Captain, I implore you! This was my mistake. If you rectify it for me, I will be disgraced."
